name: Kabuli Pulao
description: Afghanistan's national dish made with rice, lamb, raisins, and carrots seasoned with various spices.

name: Mantu
description: Afghan dumplings filled with spiced ground beef or lamb and onion, steamed and topped with tomato-based sauce and yogurt.

name: Ashak
description: Afghan dumplings filled with leeks, scallions, and herbs, boiled and topped with a spicy tomato-based sauce and yogurt.

name: Kebab
description: Chunks of marinated lamb, chicken, or beef grilled over an open flame, served with rice, naan bread, and a variety of side dishes and sauces.
